analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0x445f51299ef3307dbd75036dd896565f5b4bf7a5.sol:
	Contract VIDToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0x445f51299ef3307dbd75036dd896565f5b4bf7a5.sol#119-120)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
tkn in VIDToken.tokenFallback (/unique_chucks/1/0x445f51299ef3307dbd75036dd896565f5b4bf7a5.sol#192-193) is a local variable never initialiazed
